Functions

u16 strToU16 (u08 *str)
 Converts (or rather interprets) an array of two bytes to an unsigned 16-bit integer.
s16 strToS16 (u08 *str)
 Converts an array of two bytes to a signed 16-bit integer.
u32 strToU32 (u08 *str)
 Converts an array of four bytes to an unsigned 32-bit integer.
s32 strToS32 (u08 *str)
 Converts an array of four bytes to a signed 32-bit integer.
u64 strToU64 (u08 *str)
 Converts an array of eight bytes to an unsigned 64-bit integer.
s64 strToS64 (u08 *str)
 Converts an array of eight bytes to a signed 64-bit integer.
u08 * u16ToStr (u16 data, u08 *str)
 Converts an unsigned 16-bit integer to an array of two bytes.
u08 * s16ToStr (s16 data, u08 *str)
 Converts a signed 16-bit integer to an array of two bytes.
u08 * u32ToStr (u32 data, u08 *str)
 Converts an unsigned 32-bit integer to an array of four bytes.
u08 * s32ToStr (s32 data, u08 *str)
 Converts a signed 32-bit integer to an array of four bytes.
u08 * u64ToStr (u64 data, u08 *str)
 Converts an unsigned 64-bit integer to an array of eight bytes.
u08 * s64ToStr (s64 data, u08 *str)
 Converts a signed 64-bit integer to an array of eight bytes.
